Text: FullTime Accept Greg Smolar Cc cheneeI am pleased to announce that our previous summer intern Greg Smolar has accepted our offer for fulltime employment He is anticipating starting August Feel free to call and congratulate Greg and welcome him to Enron Greg can be contacted via the following methods Phone Email thanks Anita Martin Recruiting Coordinator Enron Corp Associate Analyst Recruiting Program

LSU Career Reception Expo Cc Attached is the tentative event sheet for the September th Career Reception Expo at Louisiana State University Please note the following Flight arrangements should be made by each participant Hotel rooms have been reserved for you at the University of FloridaDoubletree Hotel however each participant is responsible for payment You will receive a packet within the next few days with a finalized event sheet name badge map and information on expense reimbursement If you have any questions please feel free to contact myself or Valarie Barnes Anita Martin Recruiting Coordinator Enron Corp Associate Analyst Recruiting Program
